languages.text: "Я не знаю, что меня пугает больше: твоя толстолобость или несгибаемый оптимизм".
"I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."
languages.original_text: "Я не знаю, что меня пугает больше: твоя толстолобость или несгибаемый оптимизм".

traits.locale_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."
"I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."
"I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."
"I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."
"I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."

languages.text: “我真不知道是哪个更让我害怕：是你的愚蠢，还是你不知死活的乐观态度。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."

traits.locale_text: “我真不知道是哪个更让我害怕：是你的愚蠢，还是你不知死活的乐观态度。”

languages.text: «No sé qué me preocupa más, su estupidez o su optimismo incombustible».
languages.original_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."

traits.locale_text: «No sé qué me preocupa más, su estupidez o su optimismo incombustible».

languages.text: 「あなたの愚かさと、容赦ない楽観主義…どちらとも怖いです」
languages.original_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの愚かさと、容赦ない楽観主義…どちらとも怖いです」

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, was mir mehr Angst macht. Deine Dummheit oder dein grenzenloser Optimismus."
languages.original_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, was mir mehr Angst macht. Deine Dummheit oder dein grenzenloser Optimismus."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas ce qui m'effraie le plus : ta bêtise ou ton optimisme forcené. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas ce qui m'effraie le plus : ta bêtise ou ton optimisme forcené. »

languages.text: "Ahmaklığının mı yoksa sonu gelmeyen iyimserliğinin mi beni daha çok korkuttuğunu bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "I don't know what scares me more: your stupidity or your relentless optimism."
